courses.title: PPS-020726-020826-LV
courses.description: Protective Pistol Skills is the weapons-centric component of protective operations training. This comprehensive range-based course focuses on the safe and practical use of concealed handguns during protective services. Students master individual and team-based tactics, shooting from unconventional positions, and engagement techniques specific to protective environments.

courses.title: FSOC-020926-021326-LV
courses.description: Full Spectrum Operator Course represents the pinnacle of tactical training, combining multiple disciplines into comprehensive operational preparation. This advanced program integrates firearms, tactics, medical, and decision-making skills for experienced personnel operating in various threat environments. Students develop adaptability and mission-focused thinking.

courses.title: FHS-021426-021426-LV
courses.description: Fundamental Handgun Skills provides a solid foundation in handgun safety and marksmanship. This 5-hour course covers basic weapon handling, shooting fundamentals, and safety protocols. Perfect for beginners or those seeking to refresh their skills with professional instruction from expert trainers.

courses.title: CCH-021526-021526-LV
courses.description: Combative Concealed Handgun teaches advanced skills for carrying and deploying handguns from concealment. Students learn proper wardrobe selection, holster systems, legal considerations, and dynamic deployment techniques. Essential training for anyone carrying concealed weapons professionally or personally.

courses.title: NASOC-021626-021726-LV
courses.description: Nevada Armed Security Officer Certification exceeds state requirements with comprehensive 16-hour training. This certification covers advanced firearms handling, legal responsibilities, use of force decision-making, and professional conduct standards for armed security personnel. *Requires PFC Safeguards branding for compliance.

courses.title: NASOC-021626-021726-LV
courses.description: Nevada Armed Security Officer Certification exceeds state requirements with comprehensive 16-hour training. This certification covers advanced firearms handling, legal responsibilities, use of force decision-making, and professional conduct standards for armed security personnel. *Requires PFC Safeguards branding for compliance.

courses.title: PECC-021726-021826-CA
courses.description: Protective Emergency Casualty Care provides critical medical training specifically designed for protection agents and security professionals. Students learn trauma response, emergency medical procedures, and life-saving techniques that may be needed during security operations. This training can mean the difference between life and death. *Requires PFC Safeguards branding for compliance.

courses.description: Women's Personal Defense Clinic provides focused self-defense training in a supportive environment. This course covers situational awareness, physical defense techniques, safety strategies, and confidence building specifically designed for women.

courses.title: PAD ONLY-022326-022626-OR
courses.description: Protection Agent Development offers comprehensive training in contemporary personal security operations. This course creates a foundation for current and prospective protection agents through academic instruction and practical exercises. Students learn threat assessment, advance work, and low-visibility protective techniques.

courses.title: POST-022726-OR
courses.description: Protective Operations Supervisor Training prepares experienced agents for leadership roles in protective services. This specialized course covers team management, operational planning, coordination techniques, and supervisory responsibilities specific to protection operations.
